modName: Dark Knight Armor Set - Mask Replacer
summary: Alternative to newermind43's batman mask; removes the black face
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Original Mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25099/]"Dark Knight Armor Set"[/url] by Newermind43
[/center]

In the original mod, Batman's mask had a black face that covered the eyes and the mouth. While it looks cool, it does not look like the regular mask we are used to. I delved into the mesh files and made the black parts display the skin texture. It looked fine, except it was not the character's real face because it was a part of the helmet that simply had a face tacked behind it. There is a Batman mod on Steam that uses newermind43's mask, but it has no lip-syncing for this reason.

I removed the black parts in Nifskope, then reshaped and re-sized the helmet (the helmet is smaller than the character's head) with Outfit Studio and Nifskope. While it is obviously impossible to make the mask one-size-fits-all, I've done my best so I hope you all enjoy.

Unfortunately this is nor beast race compatible, elves have severe clipping, and there's no female version. There is slight clipping for humans depending on your character's build (100 weight vs 0) and facial features, such as big noses, but they are minor. I may try to fix them when I have time.

Thanks to:
NewerMind43 for the original Dark Knight Armor Set
Caliente for [url="http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?"]Outfit Studio[/url] tool
NifTools Team and their Nifskope tool
Bethesda for Skyrim
author: ceruulean
